html:
2025-0498
2025-05-13PMOFinancial Administration ActOrder amending the composition of the Treasury BoardOrder nominating the members of the King's Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the TREASURY BOARD; (2) declaring that three members of the Treasury Board constitute a quorum; and (3) directing the Minister of Finance to act as Vice Chair.N/A
subject: Order amending the composition of the Treasury Board
precis: Order nominating the members of the King's Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the TREASURY BOARD; (2) declaring that three members of the Treasury Board constitute a quorum; and (3) directing the Minister of Finance to act as Vice Chair.
